submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        new=colors*2
        mark=colors*2
        n=len(colors)
        ans=0
        for i in range(2*n):
            mark[i]=1 if new[i]!=new[i-1] else 0
        # print(mark)
        s=sum(mark[:k-1])

        for i in range(n):
            # print(s,i)
            if s==k-1:
                ans+=1
            
            s-=mark[i]
            s+=mark[k-1+i]

        return ans
